main event: A bright object was observed changing from oval to cylindrical in shape over Cambria, California on December 30, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed changing its shape and brightness during the sighting., The sighting lasted for approximately 2 hours and 35 minutes., Multiple observers reported seeing the object, which they estimated to be about 1/2 mile in size., The weather was clear with no noticeable winds during the sighting., Observers noted that the object faded from view with the coming of daylight.
witness description: Civilians including a nurseryman, a guide at Hearst Castle, a commercial photographer, a restaurant owner, and a radio station employee.
